attributes.action: actively support vocational and practical education as a valuable and credible choice in education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want more people to realise that there's more than one way to success in modern Britain.  Academic qualifications are one way. But vocational and practical learning is equally valid. We want the Govt to overtly support these options, help educate kids, parents, employers and educators that this route is a way to maximise our national raw talent. Please support this petition
